Name: Kungen
About the game: In an silent bamboo environment, Kungen is a challenging sword combat game with short levels, can be played up to 4 players locally with controllers. Paint main characters and fight against the ninjas. The combat system is based on physics. Paint your avatar Atmospheric bamboo environment Challenging ninjas AI Physics combat system
